H

handleDangerTicks(List<RedEnemy>, List<YellowEnemy>, List<Bomb>, List<Explosion>) - Method in class demolition.Manager
Removes enemies that are killed by explosions. Removes bombs that have exploded, and explosions that have been on the map for 0.5 seconds.
handleLayerDrawings(PApplet, Player, List<RedEnemy>, List<YellowEnemy>, List<Bomb>, List<Explosion>) - Method in class demolition.Manager
Calls the draw function for the player, enemies, bombs and explosions. Objects with a greater y position will be rendered afterwards.

K

keyPressed() - Method in class demolition.App
Event fired when a key is pressed and sets the boolean canPress to false. Determines which key is pressed and either drops the bomb or moves the player based on the key pressed.
keyReleased() - Method in class demolition.App
Event fired when a key is released. Sets the boolean canPress to true so that keyPressed can be used again.
kill(Background, Timer) - Method in class demolition.Player
Removes 1 life from the player and returns true if they have 0 lives left, otherwise returns false.

T

tick() - Method in class demolition.Bomb
Updates the sprite value every 0.25 seconds and returns false, or returns true at 2 seconds.
tick() - Method in class demolition.Explosion
On the first method call, it adds the appropriate horizontal and vertical explosion positions to the ArrayList and returns null. After 0.5 seconds, return the object's positions list.
tick(Player) - Method in class demolition.Lives
Calls updateMessage(), and returns true if the player's lives equal 0. Otherwise, return false.
tick(Background, Timer) - Method in class demolition.Player
Creates a new Lives object.
tick() - Method in class demolition.RedEnemy
Checks whether the enemy was killed by an explosion. If not, the sprite is updated every 0.2 seconds (12 frames) and the enemy is moved every 1 second (60 frames).
tick() - Method in class demolition.Timer
Decrements timeLeft every second (60 frames) and returns true if the time left is 0. Otherwise, return false.
tick() - Method in class demolition.YellowEnemy
Checks whether the enemy was killed by an explosion. If not, the sprite is updated every 0.2 seconds (12 frames) and the enemy is moved every 1 second (60 frames).
time - Static variable in class demolition.Manager
